statements.select: SELECT TOP 1 * FROM SupplierProcesscategory WHERE SupplierId = #value# ORDER BY InsertTime ASC
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM SupplierProcesscategory WHERE SupplierId = #value# ORDER BY InsertTime DESC
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM SupplierProcesscategory WHERE InsertTime < #InsertDate# AND SupplierId = #SupplierId# ORDER BY InsertTime DESC
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM SupplierProcesscategory WHERE InsertTime > #InsertDate# AND SupplierId = #SupplierId# ORDER BY InsertTime ASC
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * FROM SupplierProcesscategory WHERE SupplierId = #value#) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * FROM SupplierProcesscategory WHERE InsertTime < #InsertTime# AND SupplierId = #SupplierId#) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * FROM SupplierProcesscategory WHERE InsertTime > #InsertTime# AND SupplierId = #SupplierId#) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
